//Headings "Setting up the Password" Step 1 Step 2 Step 3 Step 4
//Description Open your Google account and click on "Manage your Google Account". Go to the "Security" section present on your left panel. Then enable "2 step verification". After this, click on "App Passwords". Choose "other" from "Select app panel" and give "CleanUp" as the "custom name". Then tap on "Generate". Copy this newly generated password and save it. This will be required every time while using CleanUp.
